title: The day we first met
desc: We saw each other for the first time. The beginning of our little universe 💫

title: The day you followed me
desc: You followed me back – and that changed everything. 😄

title: My first message to you
desc: A reply to your story... something funny. Who knew that would start something beautiful?

title: Snapchat stories started
desc: We started talking on Snapchat – a new way to share our moments.

title: WhatsApp connection
desc: We exchanged numbers – more personal, more special ❤️

title: First coffee date ☕
desc: Our first coffee date – and hopefully the first of many ☕❤️
